item.description:
It was recommended to invite Worcester County Over 40 group to join the Worcester County Active Singles group for a FUN time @ this upcoming Saturday night. Should be a great time! This event is organized by Jacki. Dick Beantown Comedy Escape - show is at the Crowne Plaza Worcester and dinner buffet is at the hotel restaurant. See Worcester County Active Singles for more details. Thanks Jacki for organizing this!

$20 for show
Buffet is $14.00
item.name: Buffet & Comedy Show at the Crowne Plaza in Worcester
